revised_title: On the Properties of Square Numbers and Their Applications in Resolving Odd Numbers
tldr: The author investigates properties of square numbers and quadratic forms, specifically focusing on the algebraic sum of roots. They develop a table to resolve odd numbers up to 191 into not exceeding four square numbers, and demonstrate how this can be extended to divide any odd number from 4n^2 + 2n + 1 to 4n^2 + 2n + 191 into square numbers.
